array.name: timeout_facts
array.item: Because text messaging requires visual, manual, and cognitive attention from the driver, it is by far one of the most alarming distractions.
Distracted driving is any activity that diverts a person’s attention away from the primary task of driving. All distractions endanger driver, passenger, and bystander safety.

Distracted driving is a dangerous epidemic on America’s roadways. In 2015, there were 3,477 people killed and an estimated additional 391,000 injured in motor vehicle crashes involving distracted drivers.
